Practical ML for Developing Countries Workshop @ ICLR 2022,
Learning under limited/low resource scenarios. Virtual
iclr2022
HOME CALL FOR PAPERS DATES PROGRAM PAPERS ORGANIZERS

All papers accepted for PML4DC 2022 workshop are listed below.

While the posters will be presented via Gather.Town (we will add the link here once ready), the spotlight presentations will be streamed via ICLR's virtual site for the workshop (note that ICLR registration is required).
Title Presentation Type Authors PDFs
Encoding Upper Nasal Airway Structure with U-Net for respiratory healthcare applications spotlight Bruno A Pazos (CENPAT - CONICET); Pablo Navarro (CENPAT - CONICET); Soledad De Azevedo (CENPAT - CONICET); Claudio Delrieux (CONICET - UNS); Rolando González-José (CENPAT - CONICET) pdf
Detecting landfills using multi-spectral satellite images and deep learning methods (Spotlight) spotlight Anupama Rajkumar (SZTAKI); Andras Majdik (SZTAKI) pdf
Surrogate Ensemble Forecasting for Dynamic Climate Impact Models spotlight Julian Kuehnert (IBM Research); Deborah F McGlynn (Virginia Tech); Sekou L. Remy (IBM Research - Africa); Anne Jones (IBM Research); Aisha Walcott-Bryant (IBM Research - Africa) pdf
Why so Inflammatory? Explainability in Automatic Detection of Inflammatory Social Media Users spotlight Cuong V Nguyen (Georgia Institute of Technology); Daniel Nkemelu (Georgia Institute of Technology); Michael Best (Georgia Institute of Technology); Ankit Mehta (Georgia Institute of Technology) pdf
Barriers and opportunities to improve renal outcomes in South Africa using AI technology for pediatric ultrasound interpretation spotlight Lauren Erdman (Hospital for Sick Children, University of Toronto); Karen Milford (Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital); Zubrina Solomon (Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital); Mandy Rickard (Hospital for Sick Children); Armando Lorenzo (Hospital for Sick Children); Andrew Grieve (Nelson Mandela Children's Hospital); Anna Goldenberg (Hospital for Sick Children, University of Toronto) pdf
Early Crop Type Classification with Satellite Imagery - An Empirical Analysis poster Lukas Kondmann (German Aerospace Center); Sebastian Boeck (World Food Programme); Rogerio Bonifacio (World Food Programme ); Xiaoxiang Zhu (Technical University of Munich (TUM); German Aerospace Center (DLR)) pdf
AI-powered understanding of family planning behavioural change using the Fogg Model poster Wuraola Oyewusi (Data Science Nigeria); Olubayo Adekanmbi (Data Science Nigeria); Mary Salami (Data Science Nigeria); David Oden (Data Science Nigeria); Amina Mardiyyah Rufai (Data Science Nigeria); Emmanuel Akeweje (Data Science Nigeria); Dominique Meekers (Tulane University); Olaniyi Olutola (DKT International); Chidinma Onuoha (DKT International); William Sambisa (Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation); Masduk Abdulkarim (Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation) pdf
What Should I Grow Today so I Make Money Tomorrow? Supporting Small Farmers’ Crop Planning with Social, Environmental, and Market Data poster Aviva Prins (University of Maryland, College Park); Christine R Herlihy (University of Maryland, College Park); John P Dickerson (University of Maryland) pdf
Detecting Respiratory Insufficiency by Voice Analysis: The X Project poster Sandra Maria Aluísio (USP - University of São Paulo); Larissa Berti (UNESP); Augusto Camargo (USP); Arnaldo Candido Junior (Federal University of Technology - Parana); Edresson Casanova (University of São Paulo); Flaviane R. Fernandes Svartman (USP); Ricardo Corso Fernandes (UTFPR); Marcelo Finger (University of Sao Paulo); Alfredo Goldman (USP); Lucas Rafael Stefanel Gris (UTFPR); Pedro Leyton Pereira (USP); Anna Sara Shafferman Levin (USP); Marcelo Matheus Gauy (None); Marcelo Queiroz (); Beatriz Raposo de Medeiros (USP); Ester Sabino (USP); Daniel Peixoto Pinto da Silva (UTFPR) pdf
